channel.title: Projects on Chiagoziem Cyriacus Ugoh
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Chiagoziem Cyriacus Ugoh

item.title: Project I: Sales Revenue Analysis
item.description: Ran exploratory data analysis on the dataset. Dataset was gotten from Kaggle. Regression systems were tuned to pick the best. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project II: Loan Approval Prediction
item.description: Collected dataset from Kaggle. Performed extensive Data exploratory analysis and preprocessing. Built a logistic regression model to predict the tendency of one getting approved or not. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project III: Mobile Price Classification
item.description: Got the dataset from Kaggle. Perfomed exploratory data analysis. Modelled an SVM regularization parameter. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project IV: Customer Segmentation
item.description: Ran exploratory data analysis on the dataset. Dataset was gotten from Kaggle. Tested different machine learning algorithms to know which performed best. Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project V: Fraudulent Transactions Prediction
item.description: Developed an XGBClassifier model using user bank informations like; type of transaction, initial balance, old balance, etc, to predict when a fradulent transaction is made. Got the dataset I used from Kaggle. Optimized the XGBClassifier to improve accuracy. Link to Github Repository
